title: Not what i expected!!
text: We stayed at the allerton on 7-27-09 for one night and we had to wait for our room and also gave us the wrong room i biiked a double suite and they gave me a king so my 2 kids had to sleep in the sofa bed, whe we ask for sheets no one came and gave it o us I had to go find the house keeper and get them my self.The hotel was nice and clean and a very good location if you like to shop, i guess my only complaint would be the front desk.
